## SYNCED\_QUERY\_METADATA variable

Metadata key for synced query handlers.

Used by  decorator to mark methods as query handlers and store their configuration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
SYNCED_QUERY_METADATA = "synced-query:metadata"
```
